content: this is a nod to the showtime crochet hat by the crochet crowd adjusted to be a headband instead hook size 4 0mm if your crochet gauge is very tight i would recommend going up to a 4 5mm hook to ensure there is elasticity to the piece no one wants a headband squeezing too tight finished dimensions - height 5-6in - width 8-10in recommended yarn - dk or light worsted - lion brand mandala ombre - polymorph dye works dk all day notes - fldtc front loop only drop triple crochet -> triple crochet in the front loop 3 row down - camel stitch -> when half_double_crochet in the round create stitch in the 3rd back loop so the arrow of the stitch shows to the front of the work - single_crochet single_crochet - half_double_crochet half_double_crochet - tc triple crochet - sts stitches - blo back loop only bl back loop - flo front loop only fl front loop
